divider.description: Use the divider prop to customize the divider between each link, it can be an icon or a string.
divider.description_zh: 使用 divider 属性来自定义每个链接之间的分隔符，它可以是图标或字符串。

label.name: iconClass
label.description: The class of the icon link.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Use the #default slot to customize the link label. You will have access to the link, index and isActive properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 使用#default插槽自定义链接标签。您将有权访问插槽范围内的链接、索引和isActive属性。

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Use the #icon slot to customize the link icon. You will have access to the link, index and isActive properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 使用#icon插槽自定义链接图标。您将有权访问插槽范围内的链接、索引和isActive属性。

slots.name: divider
slots.description: Use the divider slot to customize the divider of the Breadcrumb.
slots.description_zh: 使用分隔槽自定义面包屑的分隔线。
